title: v2.20.0 is ready
content:
Features:
  - Anti-aliasing (canvas and drawing-tool modes)
  - Slider bookmark
  - Spanish, German, and Portuguese support

Enhancements:
  - Eyedropper only-selected-layers mode
  - Added quick layer selection to the gesture pad and joystick's action list
  - Quick layer selection now ignores locked layers

Fix:
  - Gesture pad downward swipe not working
  - Toolbox UI not being updated when changed by joystick
  - Joystick displaying the wrong secondary color
